quote: The more of your private life you put into the public domain, the smaller your private life becomes.
author: Kevin McCloud

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it’s all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says “I’m possible”!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Start by doing what’s necessary; then do what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
author: Max Muller

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: ’Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Love is when the other person’s happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I’m sorry, if you were right, I’d agree with you.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
author: Jules Renard
